message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $110. It's a great opportunity to get a high-quality item at a reasonable price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $95.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. I am unable to accept $95 due to its value, but I am willing to negotiate further. How about considering $105?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $105 is closer than before, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $100.
